website_summaries.verdict: A simple, affordable blender with quality blades that help thoroughly blend ingredients.
pros: 12 speeds in addition to a pulse setting
Sturdy FusionBlades slice through almost anything
cons: Not ideal for crushing nuts or other tough ingredients

customer_reviews.title: bought this as a replacement in case my other one ...
customer_reviews.text: bought this as a replacement in case my other one I have messes up it was on sale figure why not have q back up since I do make ice cream shakes and smoothies I just recently had to use it and its literally been 2weeks and it already doesn't blend well at all i wish i would of used it before to make sure it works they should definitely as a company issue working ones to those that bought thier product I should of read all the reviews as well ..
customer_reviews.author: Dominicanchula

customer_reviews.title: not good for long blending
customer_reviews.text: if you are looking to run the blender for 10 minutes this is not the blender for you. i need to mix things for 10 minutes and the blender leaks, etc... i was told by the company that the blender should only blend for 1 minute and 30 seconds for the motor will not last. the rubber piece is easy to loose and it leaks should the parts are not put on correctly or the rubber piece is damaged. I would not recommend this blender unless you need quick fast blends.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Less Noise and Easier to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I like this blender because it isn't as loud as other blenders that I have used, and it blends well. I especially like the design of the blade. I have used blenders that require placing a gasket on the glass container and then screwing it tight. Over time they start to leak, and you have to purchase additional gaskets. This blade has a built in seal/gasket that you place on the container and then you screw on the plastic piece to hold the blade in place with no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: V. Upton

customer_reviews.title: A Blender With New Features
customer_reviews.text: I'm satisfied thus far. Time will tell how durable it is. I do like the blade with the built in gasket combination, the no lock /no twist feature at the base, and the pitcher just lifts off. Also, the well where the pitcher sets has a drain spout. These are new features to me. My question is ... What are the marbles I hear rolling around inside?
customer_reviews.author: (Mr.) Rene Pineda

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I bought this, the base (bottom cap) started to leak within the first month or so. I thought it was just a chance thing and got a replacement of the same one because my order was still within the return time from amazon. However, now that it has been only 5 months that I used it, the bottom cap has broken altogether on the replacement piece. I don't use it for smoothies even, so cant be a fault of usage. Never fell either. I use it only for milkshakes of fruits and ice cream. This shouldn't have happened. I have owned blenders that have lived for 20 years or more with this kind of use. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Farah A.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Power but...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender as I have a hot coffee mix I need to blend and found it was hard to find a blender that would blend hot liquids. I put it on stir - the lowest setting. Set it on low (there is a high and low setting also). When it started it just about blew the lid off the top of the blender - well it did even though I held my hand down on the lid it had too much power for me. Would be a great blender for more than just liquids I think as I'm sure it has enough power to blend anything. Just can't use it for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: tmwstar

customer_reviews.title: Blender
customer_reviews.text: It could not blend whole frozen strawberries, easy to clean and the noise level is what you expect from a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I own a mobile bartending company, and was hired to do an event, on July 1st, where they wanted blended drinks. After much searching, this product "appeared" to be the best bang for the buck, so I purchased it. I WAS WAY WRONG! Because of this product, the party was a bust. While making the first batch of Strawberry Daiquiris, the thing just died. I immediately smelled something burning, and it never worked again. Then, upon attempting to return it a couple of days later(my first opportunity), the "window for returns" had expired. VERY VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED. BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: Captain Corey

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Blender
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by America's Test Kitchen awhile back, ATK already have new model to replace this Black+Decker.. I was glad that it's still available to purchase. Works great and love the glass jar.
customer_reviews.author: Ragu

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas present for the a friends parents, it’s nice with a glass jar cavity, they needed it for drinks and they love it. The silver base is plastic but the whole unit is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!  DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: LEAKS! DON'T BUY IT. I bought one and used it for a while and it started to leak so I threw it out. I bought a 2nd one and used it for a few months and it leaked even worse creating a fruit smoothie stain on my carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and it works.
customer_reviews.text: Not expensive, but it works well. I paid 4x's as much last year for a blender that didn't make it 13 mos. Didn't think the blade would breakup frozen berries well, but does a better job than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Product was great but only had it for three week then it ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was great but only had it for three week then it stopped working.. Motor burnt out, I only put in 4 ice cubes, milk, a banana, peanut butter, and some post workout powder and the motor burnt out.... = (
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great performance for such a low price. First recipe was peanut butter, frozen banana and almond milk. Smoothie setting worked like a charm. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: illuminatethesky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that it is glass. Easy to clean. Easy to use. Has lots of different functions. Great for my smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Black

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: poor blender action, does not chop ice or even frozen fruit
customer_reviews.author: gpfnyc

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quailty
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've had the blender for a little over a month and the bottom broke out while making soup today. In THREE PIECES. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: SheGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good blender for the price. I really only needed it to make smoothies and this gphas a button just for that. Cleans easily and stores easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Perlmutter

customer_reviews.title: Need help as this must be under manufacturer's warrenty
customer_reviews.text: Please help me with this order. We really hadn't used it but while we were trying to make some fruit smoothie-it is found dead. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tek Sarma

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Blender
customer_reviews.text: Great quality blender! My husband uses it to make butter and I use it to make Pina Coladas and bread crumbs. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for product quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price for product quality. Nice looking. & good glass
customer_reviews.author: Finito

customer_reviews.title: Very Angry!
customer_reviews.text: This blender burned out and stopped working on the sixth time I used it...just to puree soup! I brought another model which works fine but I am really really (in polite words) angry that they will not allow me to return it. No star for product or amazon. Dickson
customer_reviews.author: Dickson charles McMurray

customer_reviews.title: ... appliance on the internet & it worked out just fine. This is a good blender
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've bought an appliance on the internet & it worked out just fine. This is a good blender, does everything it's supposed to, easy to take apart & wash. I thought th2 blades might be a problem with not chopping well but, it works great. Love the glass jar.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Casella

customer_reviews.title: The glass part is super heavy which I wasn't expecting
customer_reviews.text: The glass part is super heavy which I wasn't expecting, and it takes a while to chop frozen berries and stuff but besides that it works great and is an awesome blender! I've had it over a year and a half and have never had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice job!
customer_reviews.text: Totally blends stuff, and delivered fast and quick. Nice job!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Koellmann

customer_reviews.title: Great blender, bought this for my office so I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great blender, bought this for my office so I can make smoothies, but now want to make it my home blender
customer_reviews.author: The White Puma

customer_reviews.title: Machine is useless to us now so we are not happy campers
customer_reviews.text: Base broke just a couple of days after the return window closed. A thirty day warranty in today's high failure rate market is ridiculous. Machine is useless to us now so we are not happy campers.
customer_reviews.author: Cye Gray

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR $$$$
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this blender!! It can't even grind up cooked vegetables. A piece of crap! I've only used it twice and hate it! Cannot grind ice or frozen fruit.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. Powerful and large enough for multiple smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D. Cartor

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive and get the job done. It's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: A.A

customer_reviews.title: BURNED OUT- NO RETURN/REPLACE OPTION
customer_reviews.text: Worked "ok" for 5 months, then the motor burned out. Only used 5 minutes, 3 days per week- a total of 300 minutes before it failed. And there is apparently no option to return/replace with Amazon. Only a 30 day guarantee...not good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: $25 down the drain
customer_reviews.text: The motor burnt out in 2 months of infrequent use. I used a similar model for 2 years and it worked pretty well, but this one broke down so soon!
customer_reviews.author: gabais

customer_reviews.title: good enough. but a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.text: price was top criteria for me. my main use is to make smoothie, so this model is enough. main jar made in thick glass may be a bit heavy though.
customer_reviews.author: Jessy

customer_reviews.title: I believe it is a pretty dangerous item
customer_reviews.text: This blender literally burnt the first time I used it. I believe it is a pretty dangerous item. Still have not been refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice and then the motor blew out and smoothie started seeping through the bottom part
customer_reviews.author: gareauk1297

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very good. I use it everyday for fruits blending. Juice is delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice thick glass that seems like it will hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even notice that the pitcher was glass until it arrived. It's a nice thick glass that seems like it will hold up over the years. Tested it out with a bunch of large ice cubes and a little bit of water, pulverized the ice almost instantly on even one of the medium speed settings. A lot better than I expected. Highly recommended for the price.
customer_reviews.author: asaub

customer_reviews.title: Motor way too weak
customer_reviews.text: The worst!! seriously!! unless you wanna mix water and fruit juice stay away... I make a couple of smoothies everyday with frozen fruits protein powder and almond milk. While I don't like my smoothie to be too liquid the previous blenders I had handled this task without any issue. this thing has been a real annoyance to deal with. the motor is nowhere near strong enough to handle this task which frankly one should not even have to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: paulin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, wish I'd bought better
customer_reviews.text: Low quality, would never buy again. This machine is clearly cheaply made, from the chrome colored plastic front to the simplicity of design which makes it easy for the machine to leak, to the blade with two ends instead of four like my last model, to the lack of power and effectiveness. When I try to make a smoothie, it takes forever and I have to open and adjust the contents several times despite following the directions that came with the blender.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: ... is my 2nd blender in 2 years because I love this blender
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd blender in 2 years because I love this blender. I bought my first one from a 2nd hand store and fell in love with the ease of cleaning and how powerful the blender is. I drink (daily) an oatmeal smoothie for breakfast and a kale/pineapple smoothie for lunch and daily this thing crushes my frozen fruit and blends my smoothies to perfection. I love this blender. (PS - always use liquids first)
customer_reviews.author: Mandie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Defective leaky pitcher
customer_reviews.text: Just bought one of these and it seems fine. My second one arrived today and I used it once, and noticed the glass pitcher is leaking profusely from the bottom. I'm returning it but this is NOT going to be an easy product to re-box.
customer_reviews.author: ChumlyDad

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE! WORST BLENDER EVER
customer_reviews.text: i used this 4 times. The first 3 times were to blend kefir, a probiotic milk drink, with fresh bananas. The soft consistency of yogurt. The 4th time was to blend pancake batter and that is when it died. Not a single solid item was ever put in this with the exception of a very ripe banana. a TOTAL WASTE OF YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: zumamama

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the bottom tight enough
customer_reviews.text: It blended smoothies fine. But I had to wrestle with it to get the bottom off and on. Once, the bottom was not on tightly enough and smoothie spilled everywhere when I picked it up. Then when trying to take it apart, I tapped it against the kitchen sink and a chuck of the glass broke off. Maybe just don't take the bottom off once it's really tight?
customer_reviews.author: Charis

customer_reviews.title: This blender worked well for a few months. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This blender worked well for a few months. I didn't really use it for anything but grating romano and parmesan cheese, which I pre-cut into small cubes. It only worked for 5 months, then the engine just quit. The unit was not hot and gave no indication of struggling. It just stopped working. Now I'm going to attempt to get a refund under the 2 year warranty. Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: maradeb

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good blender for the cost, easy to use, gets the job done. The bottom of the jar comes off though (I suppose for cleaning the blade) but beware that it is not screwed on tight at first (out of the box)
customer_reviews.author: Sruthi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Damaged good, motor runs though wont run blade. Colossal waste of money. Scrap product
customer_reviews.author: nikhil j.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash the blades
customer_reviews.text: We have had several other blenders which their blades would get rusty after many washes since their blades were actually 2 blades connected to each other and would trap moisture. The blade on this one is one piece and super easy to clean. Best reasonably priced blender I've found for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: vash

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to a quality blender, but this broke after a half dozen uses (making smoothies). I'm disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: This blending has a wonderful glass globe
customer_reviews.text: This blending has a wonderful glass globe. The top and base of the globe are plastic and cheap. The blade seems less than I could have inspected.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Morris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great for smoothies, chops ice fast, I also make frappes with it, Best blender I have had
customer_reviews.author: CAF

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought this one for my mom, because she came to visit me, and she loved mine.
customer_reviews.author: Thiara Siqueira

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot of bad and good feedback on the blender
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot of bad and good feedback on the blender, but right off the bat I am going to say BUY this blender. I am using this blender to make frozen fruit smoothies and it is working great! The problem that I think see in the negative review is that they are ether stacking all the ingredients wrong, and/or they just forcing the blender to do certain tasks. Sometimes the blade will get stuck (Happened only once for me), but you have to stop the blender and let the drink resettle. I recommend using the pulse mode, rather than the smoothie mode.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Southern

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Crushed the ice....works and is the right size for us.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Used it a few times... maybe 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times...maybe 5 times and the plastic piece that the glass jar screws into has cracked already. I hand wash it too. .heavy duty glass jar and cheap, thin plastic. And replacement parts should be offered here for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor, but does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Instruction says not to use it for over than 1 minute at a time (?). I does smell burned/overworked in less than 1 minute, but it blends my smoothies well and in glass (which is hard to find). I just wished there were no plastic touching the food at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend
customer_reviews.text: This puppy was a "bust". I bought it as a second blender to an almost matching Black + Decker I bought at Target (same basic model without the plastic chrome) and the more (cosmetically) basic unit has been running like a top for 18 months or more. This unit smelled of burning oil and electrical motor. It lugged under load and was returned, post haste.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Daddy-O

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really big nice glass vessel and powerful motor, i made hummus and pesto in it successfully yesterday
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Uriel

customer_reviews.title: but it's working great. please note that jar is glass and not ...
customer_reviews.text: wasn't sure about the cheap price, but it's working great. please note that jar is glass and not plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product!! I wish I had more time to use this item.
customer_reviews.author: deanallen

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, served the purpose for what I needed. I had another brand before but was not in stock @ the time I needed my replacement. Still would buy again...
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister and law, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Gisel Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so much easier to use then the Big fancy juicers
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Alpert

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This blender unit quit working after two (2) light uses.
customer_reviews.author: L.M. Weekes

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect the size doesn't take up too much space and ...
customer_reviews.text: we use this for margaritas, salsa, sauce, curried, stews and more. Its perfect the size doesn't take up too much space and I love that it can go in a backpack as well. After using this a few times I just realized it no longer blends anything not even smoothies! Hey if your thinking of getting this, get the warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Daisha Nieto

customer_reviews.title: Take a close look before you completely un-pack it
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and unpacked it. I discovered that the top "control panel" surface of the base of the unit, which is chrome-plated plastic, had fine lines, almost like a brushed aluminum type look (see photo). But the rest of the unit is shiny, mirror-like, "un-brushed" chrome. I presume this simply was a case of poor quality control, or perhaps it's why this blender is offered at a low price. Regardless, I laboriously re-packed the item and returned it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzcat

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER FusionBlade Blender with 6-Cup Glass Jar, 12-Speed Settings, Silver, BL1111SG
product_meta.description: The BLACK+DECKER FusionBlade Blender combines advanced blade technology with innovative jar geometry to take care of all your blending needs. From mixing and chopping to blending and pureeing, the 12 speeds of the powerful 550W motor get the job done quickly. Dishwasher-safe removable parts make cleanup fast and easy.
feature_bullets: FusionBlade - The stainless steel blade quickly crushes ice and blends thoroughly
12 Speeds + Pulse - Find the perfect blending power for everything from sauces to smoothies with 12 speed settings. The pulse function lets you create the perfect consistency
6-cup Glass Jar - The durable 6-cup (48oz.) glass jar is designed to increase blending efficiency. Its thick walls allow for safe blending of hot soups and more
1-oz. Lid Insert - The clear lid insert lets you drizzle in oil or other liquids during blending, and it doubles as a 1-oz. measuring cup for making blended mixed drinks
Dishwasher-Safe Parts - All removable parts are dishwasher-safe for fast and easy cleanup
12 Speeds + Pulse - Find the perfect blending power for everything from sauces to smoothies with 12 speed settings. The pulse function lets you create the perfect consistency
6-cup Glass Jar - The durable 6-cup (48oz.) glass jar is designed to increase blending efficiency. Its thick walls allow for safe blending of hot soups and more
550W Power - Tough blending is no match for the powerful motor inside this blender

FusionBlade - The stainless steel FusionBlade is designed to quickly crush ice and evenly blend soups and smoothies. The shape of the jar helps to create a constant flow straight to the blade so food is blended as quickly as possible
Dishwasher-Safe Parts - All removable parts are dishwasher-safe for fast and easy cleanup
Slip-Resistant Rubber Feet - The powerful blender stays in place thanks to the strong rubber grips
Cord Storage - The convenient cord wrap within the unit makes for easy storage
1-oz. Lid Insert - The clear lid insert lets you drizzle in oil or other liquids during blending, and it doubles as a 1-oz. measuring cup for making blended mixed drinks
